author: martinkimoe
message:
Add handling for missing video duration and captions that are too short

- Introduced constants for new error states: CAPTIONS_TOO_SHORT and VIDEO_IS_MISSING_DURATION.
- Updated fetch_video_info to set video as broken if duration is missing or captions are too short (at least 1 word per second video).
- Added is_captions_too_short function to evaluate caption length against video duration.
